response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, as it is worth $1,200,000 to you. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, I propose a special introductory price of $1,100,000 for this transaction. This offer represents a remarkable saving of $100,000 compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 1100000}
